name: MenuCustomiser
description:
Menu Customiser plugin let you design your own main menu,
Game End Menu, ItemScene (soon Equip Menu) for your game.

there are 5 Button Layout included (rename them to MM_ButtonSet)
which is removing the brackets and efffect name, or place them save.

those button set and menu layout are not for use, but used as template
to create your own.

find sample and more info on the forum. (also for suggestions, feedback).
ofcourse, you can leave them here too.  

Enjoy

PS: Plugin is free in non-commercial and commercial games,
Paid version is decrypted to alter it's code (no extra's).

Once paid, no refund possible, help is included in both, do not steal
or parts of the code.
